overview: Brian Bergstrom is responsible for developing and implementing the company’s corporate strategy for innovation and success. Brian’s vision for the organization is focused on excellence. By creating an environment that provides every employee an opportunity to succeed and excel, he has led the corporation without losing sight of the customers’ needs. He has successfully maintained a streamlined organization that can respond effectively to technological advances and economic change. Prior to joining SecureNet’s management team in 1997, Brian worked with Advanced Entry Systems, Sensormatic Electronics, and SPAN Instruments. With over fifteen years of experience in the security and semi-conductor industry, Brian is an inspiring leader for SecureNet’s system integration team.
